text: int main ( ) { int i , t , n , j , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ ( n * ( n + 1 ) ) / 2 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } j = 0 ; sum = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( ( a [ i ] [ j ] ) > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } else { sum = sum + a [ j ] [ j + 1 ] ; j = j + 1 ; } } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
